title: Maafé Is the Versatile, Warming Stew You Should Be Making This Fall
description: The Senegalese stew, which works well with any mix of vegetables and proteins, is one of Yewande Komolafe’s favorite seasonal comforts.
dc:creator: Yewande Komolafe
media:credit: Chris Simpson for The New York Times. Food Stylist: Simon Andrews. Prop Stylist: Paige Hicks.
media:description: Maafé can be made ahead, refrigerated and reheated whenever you need. Its rich flavor only improves with time.
